In order to adapt to the high temperatures and lack of water, they have not only taken on a fairly unique shape, but their reproductive methods have also changed.<br>Though the researchers of the [[Akademiya]] firmly deny this, the desert folk believe that the [[Wenut|giant life forms]] within the sands are the mature and complete forms of these creatures following pupation.

'''Quicksand Eel''' is a type of [[Unagi]] that can be found in the wild in the desert of [[Sumeru]]. It normally has its upper body sticking out of the sand, but will quickly hide if startled.

Quicksand Eels hatch from [[Sand Grease Pupa]]e.

==Drops==
{{Card|Eel Meat|1}}

==Locations==
Quicksand Eels can be found in all parts of the desert except for the [[Girdle of the Sands]].

See the '''[https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html?lang=en-us#/map/2?shown_types=442 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
